item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, Orissa Minerals and Market Trends for Sep 2025
item.description: As the Sep-2025 quarter earnings season concludes with 3,990 companies reporting, the market reveals a nuanced picture of corporate performance across sectors and market capitalisations. Tata Steel, FSN E-Commerce, and Orissa Minerals Development Company Ltd stand out among the top performers, while overall positive result proportions show subtle shifts compared to previous quarters. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Sanghvi Movers Sees Revision in Market Evaluation Amid Mixed Financial Signals
item.description: Sanghvi Movers, a small-cap player in the automobile sector, has experienced a revision in its market evaluation reflecting a nuanced view of its recent financial and technical performance. This shift comes amid a backdrop of mixed operational results and fluctuating stock returns, prompting a reassessment of the company’s standing within its sector. Time: 4 hours ago
